data.text: @UKMTB_Chat Bottom bracket and pivot bearings replacement this weekend. Winter riding has taken its toll on my bike. Hopefully Peak District tomoz.
@UKMTB_Chat Glad you’re back at it. The energy levels will pick back up over time - just don’t expect to be back to full power instantly.
@grayomtb Needed it fella. Need to try and get some lunch time spins in this week - get the mojo back 🤘
@UKMTB_Chat Great to see you’ve been back out. 🤟🤟
@UKMTB_Chat I went for a Kinder suprise after work.
@caledonia2k Sounds a success. 10 runs is a mega effort as well 💯

@UKMTB_Chat Yeah, I decided not to :( just wasn't feeling it, not over the manky cold, and had an awful night's sleep. #nomojo #sucks.  Lad managed 10 laps and had a ball. Lots of pals there today so a cracking day for yoofs and adults alike. No injury, no mechanicals for anyone 😎

@caledonia2k Ah, did you not ride in the end?

How did the uplift go?
@UKMTB_Chat Was indeed a beeee-utiful day down there today. I'm actually a wee bit sunburned. That'll teach me to not take the bike and just watch the lad on the uplift !
